Hospital Helper.name: Hospital Helper
Hospital Helper.summary: An application to ease patient-pratictioner interactions for elderly Ghanaians
Hospital Helper.problemStatement: Francis, a married and retired 67-year-old Ghanaian man, needs to receive cordial and meaningful service when physically visiting the hospital to improve his patient-practitioner interactions as an aged person

Alarm Clock.summary: Alarm clock mobile application for Gen-Z anime fans
Alarm Clock.problemStatement: Generation Z university students need an alarm clock app which is more tuned to their specific needs and wants

ASH Group Manager.name: ASH Group Manager

ASH Group Manager.summary: A web-based course group manager for Ashesi University faculty
ASH Group Manager.problemStatement: Ashesi University faculty need an easy and streamlined way to consolidate with student groups created to facilitate course teachings

ASH WiFi Manager.name: ASH WiFi Manager
ASH WiFi Manager.embed: <iframe width='100%'  width='500' src='https://www.figma.com/embed?embed_host=share&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.figma.com%2Ffile%2FBeXSx1ZNqkDVMYtsxDFV6T%2FMid-Semester-Challenge---Chinwe-Ibegbu%3Ftype%3Ddesign%26node-id%3D2%253A3%26mode%3Ddesign%26t%3Dkze2bL04zUC9Y6Vm-1' title='ASH WiFi Manager' allowfullscreen></iframe>
ASH WiFi Manager.summary: A mobile app for Ashesi University WiFi management on-the-go
ASH WiFi Manager.problemStatement: The Ashesi University I.T. Department needs a mobile app to quickly access WiFi management details on-the-go to ease the troubleshooting and problem-solving process
